title: unesco_heritage_State_Historical_and_Cultural_Park_“Ancient_Merv”
text:
Name: State Historical and Cultural Park “Ancient Merv”. short_description:

Merv is the oldest and best-preserved of the oasis-cities along the Silk Route in Central Asia. The remains in this vast oasis span 4,000 years of human history. A number of monuments are still visible, particularly from the last two millennia.

. date_inscribed: 1999. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 62.1775. latitude: 37.70083. area_hectares: 353.24. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Turkmenistan. Region: Asia and the Pacific. iso_code: tm. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
